name: Hatch (Nekoromorph)
description:
Overview

"Hatch" is a single-player, first-person horror game. The player is unarmed and hiding while trying to reach his goal.

Summary

The protagonist wakes up in the morning and finds a hatch in the middle of his room. Running from intruders, the protagonist is forced to make a choice.

Language

Japanese and English are supported.

Please note

This game contains intense violence, blood and gore. Also, there will be sudden loud noises. Please refrain from playing if you have a weak heart.

How to Install

Only Windows is supported. Download the file and extract it.

It may not work with integrated graphics cards. For DirectX 11.
